attributes.action: contact the US govt & prevent their inteference in a Just verdict re: Knox trial
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The American media has not shown all the evidence against Knox & practically ignored the suffering & abuse of Meredith Kercher. If the US govt intervenes in this, they will alienate yet more people. Do not allow this just verdict for Meredith to be put aside because of US govt pressure.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
